mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reply (rep_no, rep_content, rep_writer, rep_req_date, rep_bbs_no) VALUES (rep_seq.nextval, #{repContent}, #{repWriter}, SYSDATE, #{repBbsNo})
mapper.select: SELECT rep_no, rep_content, rep_writer, rep_req_date, rep_bbs_no FROM reply WHERE rep_bbs_no = #{repBbsNo} ORDER BY rep_req_date DESC
